channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for ID

item.title: Report X-2023110532
item.description:
Report X-2023110532

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-04T15:11:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-25
  • City: BOISE
  • State: ID
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: AM QA discovered package leaking in unload. Employee put on proper PPE. Package was contained and placed in a lined hazmat bin. Bin was then placed in Hazmat cage under the air vent. DescribePack: There were 7 boxes inside this package that each contained 30 test tubes that were filled with hydrogen peroxide. 3 of the boxes were damaged resulting in all 30 tubes of those 3 boxes to break and spill on the box. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Employee put on proper PPE. Package was contained and placed in a lined hazmat bin. Bin was then placed in Hazmat cage under the air vent.

item.title: Report X-2023110276
item.description:
Report X-2023110276

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-30T18:13:44+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-30
  • City: BOISE
  • State: ID
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: UNLOADER FOUND LEAKING PACKAGE IN THE TRAILER HE WAS UNLOADING; HE LEFT THE TRAILER AND NOTIFIED HIS SUPERVISOR OF THE LEAKER WHO CALLED OVER THE RESPONDER. THE RESPONDER ARRIVED AT THE SPILLAGE AREA AND CONTAINED THE SPIL AND BROUGHT TO THE DMP.
